content: this pattern is part of a series of internal organs i m making it is life-sized and the plan is that it will fit together nicely with all of the other organs of the human digestive system the facial features and glasses are entirely optional but they give it a fun touch you will need a 2mm crochet hook 1 ball of anchor creative fino 4ply yarn in light orange black 4ply yarn white sewing cotton 0 5mm craft wire optional a regaulr sewing needle a darning needle polyester toy stuffing a pair of scissors
